title: Peptide shows promise for protecting kidneys from nephritis

title_detail.value: Peptide shows promise for protecting kidneys from nephritis

summary: A synthetic peptide appears to directly disrupt the destructive inflammation that occurs in nephritis, enabling the kidneys to better recover and maintain their important functions, investigators report.
